meaningMnemonic: You know that 魔法 is "magic" so what about someone who <kanji>use</kanji>s <kanji>magic</kanji>? What are they called? How about a <vocabulary>wizard</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>witch</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>sorcerer</vocabulary>?
readingMnemonic: The reading for 魔法 is what you learned with the kanji. The reading for 使い is the same as 使う.
